title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality web applications using modern React technologies. This role offers the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and mentor junior developers.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with React and JavaScript
Strong knowledge of TypeScript and modern CSS
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand)
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Experience with modern build tools and CI/CD processes
benefits: Flexible work hours and remote options

title: Product Designer
description: Join our design team as a Product Designer where you'll create intuitive and beautiful user experiences. You'll work closely with product managers and engineers to design solutions that delight our users and drive business growth.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma and design systems
Strong understanding of user experience principles
Experience with user research and testing

title: Full Stack Developer
description: We're looking for an ambitious Full Stack Developer to help build our next-generation platform. This is a great opportunity for a junior developer to grow their skills in a fast-paced startup environment with mentorship from senior engineers.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our infrastructure team as a Senior DevOps Engineer. You'll be responsible for designing and maintaining scalable cloud infrastructure, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring high availability of our services.
requirements: Expertise with AWS or Azure cloud platforms
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: Data Scientist
description: We're seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our analytics team. You'll work on exciting machine learning projects, analyze complex datasets, and help drive data-driven decisions across the organization.
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python and SQL
Experience with machine learning libraries (scikit-learn, pandas)
Knowledge of statistical analysis and modeling

title: Marketing Manager
description: Lead our marketing initiatives as a Marketing Manager. You'll develop and execute marketing strategies, manage campaigns across multiple channels, and work with cross-functional teams to drive growth and brand awareness.
requirements: Strong analytical and project management skills

title: Backend Engineer
description: We need an experienced Backend Engineer for a 6-month contract to help build our new API infrastructure. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies and contribute to high-performance, scalable systems.
requirements: Expertise in Go, Python, or Java
Strong knowledge of database design and optimization
Familiarity with message queues and caching systems

title: UX Researcher
description: Join our UX team as a part-time UX Researcher. You'll conduct user research studies, analyze user behavior, and provide insights that inform product design decisions. Perfect for someone looking for work-life balance.
requirements: Proficiency with research tools and software
Ability to translate research into actionable insights

title: Mobile Developer
description: We're looking for an enthusiastic Mobile Developer to join our team building innovative mobile applications. You'll work on both iOS and Android projects using modern frameworks and collaborate with designers and product managers.
requirements: Knowledge of React Native or Flutter
Understanding of mobile app deployment processes
Familiarity with mobile UI/UX best practices

title: Project Manager
description: Lead complex technology projects as a Senior Project Manager. You'll coordinate cross-functional teams, manage project timelines and budgets, and ensure successful delivery of software solutions using Agile methodologies.
requirements: PMP or Scrum Master certification preferred
